FuncDef: The display mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics command displays statistics about the hard pipe traffic on the AC side.
CLIs: display mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } inbound
display mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-number> } outbound

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-

Display statistics about the upstream hard pipe traffic on the AC side.
-

Display statistics about the downstream hard pipe traffic on the AC side.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics interface GigabitEthernet1/0/1 inbound
Last 30 seconds passed rate: 0 bps, 0 pps
Last 30 seconds dropped rate: 0 bps, 0 pps
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check statistics about the hard pipe traffic on the AC side, run the display mpls l2vpn hard-pipe statistics command.
